page.title: 11GOVERNMENT-PARISH COUNCIL
page.content:
CONTINUED FROM PAGE 10
THE REPLY FROM THE BOROUGH ENGINEER, IT WAS ALLEGED,DISPLAYED VIRTUALLY NO UNDERSTANDING OF THE PROBLEMS OF THE RESIDENTS AND THE CHAIRMAN OFFERED TO REPLY TO THE BOROUGH ENGINEER TO CLARIFY THE SITUATION.SUFFOLK COUNTY COUNCIL HAVE REPEATED THEIR OFFER TO SUPPLY 10 TREES FREE OF CHARGE UNDER THE DEDHAM VALE SCHEME,AND THEY WERE GOING TO MEET MEMBERS OF THE COUNCIL AT A LATER MEETING.MRS SEARLE POINTED OUT THAT THE LITTER BIN PROMISED BY THE BOROUGH COUNCIL HAD NOT YET BEEN INSTALLED,AND THE CLERK PROMISED TO REMIND THEM,A FURTHER REQUEST IS TO BE SENT TO EASTERN ELECTRICITY,ASKING FOR A DECISION ABOUT AN ADDITIONAL STREET LIGFHT OPPOSITE THE VILLAGE HALL
FROM THE MINUTES OF THE MEETING
